entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Liverpool
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Western Head 06:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: 5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 5.0°C
Wind: SE 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to a few showers this afternoon. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Drizzle. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Drizzle or rain showers changing to periods of light snow after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
